name: Seba Jagat
briefDescription: Seba Jagat has been working in the field or rural development since last 22 years focusing on the most vulnerable section i.e tribals, downtrodden,landless and marginal farmers,focussing on women and children  among 15000 population. Seba Jagat works directly in Kalahandi and Kondhamal district and through networks work in 10 districts of Odisha.The major works include  activities Secure sustainable Livelihood through development of farm and non farm sector, Enterprising activities among women, sanitation Improvement. 29 villages are declared Open Defecation Free, Employble Skill training for youth , Grievance redressal in using mobile technology in convergence with administration, drought relief measures in community participation, Primary
